data.name: NDC TechTown 2020 - Online Workshop Event
data.description: NDC TechTown 31 Aug - 3 Sept 2020. Conference for software developers focusing on software development for products. IoT /Embedded /C++ . NDC TechTown 2020 is a 4 day event with workshops 31 Aug-1 Sept, followed by a 2 day conference 2-3 September. Both the workshops and the conference will be held …
